definitions.definition: The act of accomplishing; completion; fulfilment.
definitions.example: the accomplishment of an enterprise, of a prophecy, etc

definitions.definition: That which completes, perfects, or equips thoroughly; acquirement; attainment; that which constitutes excellence of mind, or elegance of manners, acquired by education or training.
(grammar) The lexical aspect (aktionsart) of verbs or predicates that change over time until a natural end point.
